title.narrative: E-Learning Solutions to Support the Justice Academy of the Ministry of Justice of Azerbaijan – Phase II

description.narrative: This project supports the Justice Sector Reforms in Azerbaijan by building the capacity of the Justice Academy to provide trainings, develop and institutionalize courses within the formal curriculum of theAcademy. The project aims to contribute to the Academy's efforts to build capacity of, judges, candidate judges, prosecutors and lawyers. Inaddition, the project aims to expand access to justice as it anticipatesestablishment of Legal Aid Centers and provision of pro-bono legal aid in four regional hubs. The proposed activities are the extension of the E-Learning Solutions to Support Justice Academy of the Ministry of Justice of the Republic of Azerbaijan project and aim to further enhancecapacities and learning at the judicial level. The proposed extension has been designed and will be carried out in close coordination and cooperation with the Academy as a result of the project's successful implementation capacities of justice sector actors addressing domestic and transnational crimes will be improved. Additionally the project withfurther contribute to the implementation of national action plans pertaining to criminal justice reforms in the country. Furthermore, the action will contribute to the civil society participation through facilitation of engagement in the provision of free legal aid to the population and consequently expand access to justice in the country.
